original_text:
For the day is near,
    the day of the Lord is near;
it will be a day of clouds,
    a time of doom for the nations.
korean_text: 그 날이 가깝도다 여호와의 날이 가깝도다 구름의 날일 것이요 여러 나라들의 때이리로다

sentences.original_text: the day of the Lord is near;
it will be a day of clouds,
a time of doom for the nations.
